title: Interdisciplinary Exploration of Design Studies and Material Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational humanities and design concepts
context.additional_context: Most learners are at novice levels in design/humanities fields, aiming for practical application. Digital tools are utilizable in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the physical and social meanings of everyday objects from an interdisciplinary perspective.
Learners cultivate critical thinking skills that incorporate cultural contexts in design research.
Learners compare and apply research methodologies across disciplines (industrial design, anthropology, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
